frame.name: Graph_shape
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame descibes a <fen>Shape</fen> that <fen>Data</fen> makes on a <fen>Graph</fen>.
<ex>The <t>trace</t> <fex name="Data">of the first trial</fex> <fex name="Graph">on the graph on the right</fex> shows a sharp increase after stage 1.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Shape
FE.definition: <def-root>A pattern that can be recognized when the Data is represented on a Graph.</def-root>

FE.name: Data
FE.definition: <def-root>A (usually quantitative) abstraction of information being represented in some Shape on a Graph.</def-root>

FE.name: Graph
FE.definition: <def-root>The visual representation of the information extracted from the Data.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>An sequenced based naming system for individual members of a group.</def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition: <def-root>A specific region within the Graph which reveals a Shape or pattern.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: trace.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the path created by the movement of information along two axes of a graph

lexUnit.name: plot.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the pattern of many pieces of data marked on a graph
